com.blackshark.gamesdk

Class LightManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.blackshark.gamesdk.LightManager

  • public class LightManager
extends java.lang.Object
    class that perform the rich light effects on Blackshark Gaming Phone.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_FLOW
      id of light animation, identifies Flow
      static java.lang.String EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_FLOW_BOTH_WAY
      id of light animation, identifies Both-Way
      static java.lang.String EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_GATHER
      id of light animation, identifies Gather

      id of light animation, identifies Rainbow
      static java.lang.String EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_RHYTHM
      id of light animation, identifies Rhythm
      static java.lang.String EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_SPREAD
      id of light animation, identifies Spread
      static java.lang.String EVENT_HUB_ID_LOGO
      id of logo lights
      static java.lang.String EVENT_HUB_ID_SIDE
      id of side lights
      static java.lang.String EVENT_KEY_ANIMATION_ID
      identifies light animation effect id, these are available: EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_RAINBOW, EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_FLOW, EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_FLOW_BOTH_WAY, EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_GATHER, EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_SPREAD, EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_RHYTHM
      static java.lang.String EVENT_KEY_HUB_ID
      identifies which light to use, current we have EVENT_HUB_ID_LOGO, EVENT_HUB_ID_SIDE
      static java.lang.String EVENT_KEY_LOOP
      identifies how many cycles to play, "0" mean infinite
      static java.lang.String EVENT_KEY_NAME
      identifies event name
      static java.lang.String EVENT_NAME_SIDES_END
      event name of light effect play stop
      static java.lang.String EVENT_NAME_SIDES_START
      event name of light effect play start

    • Method Detail

      • notifyLightEvent

        public static void notifyLightEvent(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> event)
        send event to LightManager to perform variety light effects.
        Parameters:
        event - consists of sets of key-value pairs.
        key name value
        EVENT_KEY_HUB_ID EVENT_HUB_ID_SIDE
        EVENT_HUB_ID_LOGO
        EVENT_KEY_NAME EVENT_NAME_SIDES_START
        EVENT_NAME_SIDES_END
        EVENT_KEY_ANIMATION_ID EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_RAINBOW
        EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_FLOW
        EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_FLOW_BOTH_WAY
        EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_GATHER
        EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_SPREAD
        EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_RHYTHM
        EVENT_KEY_LOOP integer string, how many cycles to play, "0" means infinite 
          sample:
  
  // play start
  HashMap<String, String> startEvent = new HashMap<>();
  startEvent.put(LightManager.EVENT_KEY_HUB_ID, LightManager.EVENT_HUB_ID_SIDE);
  startEvent.put(LightManager.EVENT_KEY_NAME, LightManager.EVENT_NAME_SIDES_START);
  startEvent.put(LightManager.EVENT_KEY_ANIMATION_ID, LightManager.EVENT_ANIMATION_SIDES_FLOW);
  startEvent.put(LightManager.EVENT_KEY_LOOP, "0");
  LightManager.notifyLightEvent(startEvent);

  // play stop
  HashMap<String, String> stopEvent = new HashMap<>();
  stopEvent.put(LightManager.EVENT_KEY_HUB_ID, LightManager.EVENT_HUB_ID_SIDE);
  stopEvent.put(LightManager.EVENT_KEY_NAME, LightManager.EVENT_NAME_SIDES_END);
  LightManager.notifyLightEvent(stopEvent);

      • isLightManagerSupported

        public static boolean isLightManagerSupported()
        weather support Blackshark LightManager
        Returns:
        true if Blackshark LightManager supported
